text:
Company: Wallace-Mack

Role: Technician

Company Background: Wallace-Mack is a leading provider of innovative technology solutions, known for our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. We prioritize inclusivity and diversity, ensuring a supportive and welcoming work environment for all employees.

Job Type: Full-Time

Job Description: We are seeking a skilled and dedicated Technician to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for maintaining and repairing technical equipment, ensuring all systems operate efficiently. This role requires attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.

Responsibilities:
- Perform routine maintenance and repairs on technical equipment.
- Diagnose and troubleshoot hardware and software issues.
- Ensure all technical systems are functioning optimally.
- Provide technical support and training to team members as needed.
- Maintain detailed records of maintenance and repair work.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- High school diploma or equivalent; technical certification preferred.
- Proven experience as a technician or in a similar role.
- Strong understanding of technical equipment and systems.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Good communication skills to interact with team members and clients.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from USD 40,000 to USD 55,000 based on experience and skills.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- 401(k) retirement plan with company match.
- Paid time off and flexible working hours.
- Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
- A supportive and inclusive work environment where all employees can bring their authentic selves to work.

Our Commitment to Inclusivity:
Wallace-Mack is dedicated to fostering a workplace free from discrimination and harassment of any kind. We are committed to creating a supportive environment for the LGBTQIA community. Our hiring process is designed to be inclusive and fair, ensuring that everyone has an equal opportunity to thrive in their careers with us. We believe in the value of diverse perspectives and experiences, and we support our employees in bringing their authentic selves to work every day.
